name: The Town and Castle of Saumur from across the Loire
description: The Town and Castle of Saumur from across the Loire; Lambert Doomer (Dutch, 1624 - 1700); about 1670; Pen and brown ink, brown-gray, red and green washes on ledger paper; 24 x 41.1 cm (9 7/16 x 16 3/16 in.); 84.GA.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Town and Castle of Saumur from across the Loire
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown-gray, red and green washes on ledger paper
